name: Dinner Tonight: Shrimp, Arugula, and Caper Mayonnaise on Brioche
description: I found this recipe in Wine Bar Food by Cathy and Tony Mantuano. It's a beautiful book that showcases simple recipes from wine bars in Southern Europe. It's enough to make you want to blast through a few credit cards...

recipeInstructions.text: Plop an egg yolk into a large bowl. Add the capers, and use a fork to break up a few of them. Pour in the lemon juice. Slowly whisk in the olive oil until thick and creamy.
Add a few leaves of arugula on top of half the pieces of toasted bread, then add a spoonful of the shrimp mixture. Top with a few more leaves and another piece of bread.
